numpy>=1.26
scipy

[all]
fedoo[dataio,plot,solver,test]

[dataio]
pandas

[other]
microgen
simcoon

[plot]
matplotlib

[solver]

[solver:platform_machine != "arm64" and platform_machine != "aarch64"]
pypardiso
